title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 203.20 - Crematory operator course computation of instruction time
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 203.20 - Crematory operator course computation of instruction time

State Regulations

The certification course for crematory employees shall be a
one day course for a total of a minimum of eight hours of instruction to be
provided by the approved organization. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
203.20

Renumbered from 204.6

New

York State Register August 7, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 32, eff. 8/7/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
